title: Reports in ranked team select
body: Why do we not have this already now that autofill is added because I have had so many god damn *beep* that's not funny just because they get filled to support when right now you SHOULD know how to play support before you play ranked cause autofill does happen and you usually get shoved in support and they go oh mid top only and instalock a mid/top champ soon as they have their pick seriously we need something that can help prevent this maybe the ability to leave once every 24 hrs or to kick a player and search for a new player with the kicked player not allowed to join a q with anyone he was just paired with something sent to the tribunal and if the kick wasn't valid the people who voted yes would get say a 20lp loss if it was valid then the kicked party would get the 20lp loss not like this would matter to the one who was kicked validly because they already didn't care if they received a loss

replies.body:
That's because so many people under appreciate the support role.

Rito has already made a boards post on the issue which was met with vigor from the support role players.
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/free-rotation/some-thoughts-support
